subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tony Gonzalez needs just 50 yards to overtake Shannon Sharpe’s record of 10,060 yards receiving for a tight end. He already has the records for touchdown catches (67) and receptions (835) for tight ends.
snippet: Tony Gonzalez needs just 50 yards to overtake Shannon Sharpe’s record of 10,060 yards receiving for a tight end. He already has the records for touchdown catches (67) and receptions (835) for tight ends.
